item.description:
Time for some more writing exercises! These fun games could turn into your next story, especially since this week we will be attempting to brainstorm at Tavern on the Square in Porter!tav

30 rotating taps, fried pickles, and writing. Oh, heaven.

Speaking of food...When you are RSVPing, please keep in mind that this is a sit-down restaurant, so we should all order something - even if we're just having drinks and pitching in for table appetizers. Also, please ONLY RSVP 'Yes' if you KNOW you can be there. I need to call ahead.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me, and the fried pickles!
item.name: Writing Exercises and Fried Pickles
